item.title: OpenShift - WordPress Tutorial - CodeTab
item.description: In the OpenShift WordPress Tutorial, we cover the steps to create a free OpenShift account and a WordPress application. OpenShift is a cloud computing Platform as a Service (PaaS) from Red Hat, which, in simple terms, means it offers a virtual server with all the server components we need to run an application. In other words, OpenShift offers a virtual development environment - Linux OS with Internet connectivity - where we are free to deploy, develop and run various types of application written in supported languages.
